BSCreature.sDescription:
DESCRIPTION: Glow
Worms are 2-foot long caterpillars with a smooth yellow hide hide. At night they glow with the intensity of torchlight. By day, they devour any vegetable matter rhey can get their teeth into.

Glow Worms ate non-violent, but rhey will bite almost anything that gets near their
mourhs. At night, they spend their time gathering leaves, sticks and other juicy
vegetable matter, so rhey can spend the daylight hours eating in their lairs.
